A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Let me just say- I've been a die-hard Star Wars fan since I could breathe\, and almost every second of this movie was fantastic for me. From the amazing music to the intense battles I felt like I was right with the characters. I loved how characters became further developed (cough cough\, Kylo Ren) and how the directors used that development to further blur the lines between the light and the dark. Overall- one of my favorite movies in the franchise.
